title: Deserving First-Time All-Stars | Upside High
description:
J. Kyle Mann and Jonathan Tjarks are back to discuss some of the most impressive young players who are deserving of All-Star status, beginning with LaMelo Ball and the young roster of Hornets players (05:02). Then they discuss the Cavaliers and their great offensive cohesion (11:47). Then they go to Atlanta, where the Hawks have been consistently impressive (18:21).
Hosts: J. Kyle Mann and Jonathan Tjarks
Producer: Steve Ahlman
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
